TextEng: "I need to ask you something."
"I have died and wish to return to where I fell."
"But Toril is my home!"
"You can't comply? But I command you!"
"What? Who says I'm barred from there?"
Text: "뭐라고요? 누가 제가 거기 출입 금지라고 했죠?"

TextEng: "So you worked for Mephistopheles all along."
"I knew it! You lied to me!"
"His forever? What do you mean?"
"But he's not here to command you now."
Text: "하지만 지금 그가 여기서 당신에게 명령하는 건 아니잖아요."

TextEng: "What is a True Name?"
"So am I stuck here forever?"
"What do you mean he took my place?"
"Cania? Isn't that one of the Nine Hells?"
"The realm of Cania? What do you mean?"
"Here? But... I'm not in Cania, am I?"
Text: "여기요? 하지만... 제가 카니아에 있는 건 아니죠?"

TextEng: "Is there nothing you can do to help me?"
Text: "저를 도와줄 수 있는 건 아무것도 없나요?"

TextEng: "I have other questions."
"I must go."
"What of my companions? Where are they?"
"No, summon no one."
"Summon forth Valen."
"Summon forth Nathyrra."
"Summon forth Deekin."
"I can't think of anyone else."
"I seek the Five-Fold Mysteries of the Sleeping Man."
"Yes, it is. What is he waiting for?"
"And who is 'she'?"
"So tell me again what I could do to return home?"
Text: "그러면 집으로 돌아가려면 어떻게 해야 하는지 다시 말해주세요."

TextEng: "Hecugoth the Abandoned, I command you to grant me passage home!"
Text: "버림받은 헤쿠고스여, 고향으로 가는 길을 열라 명한다!"

TextEng: "Thank you, Reaper. That will be all."
"Allow the Devils to wreak their havoc on the planes."
"Allow the Spirits of the Dead to haunt the Living."
Text: "죽은 자들의 영혼이 산 자들을 괴롭히게 허하라."

TextEng: "Allow the Githzerai Pilgrims to return home."
"I have died and wish to return to where I fell."
"What do you know about Cania?"
"Surely there are other ways back to Toril?"
Text: "분명 토릴로 돌아가는 다른 방법이 있을 텐데요?"

TextEng: "You sound as if you'd prefer to betray Mephistopheles."
"But aren't you worried that I might abuse your True Name?"
Text: "하지만 제가 당신의 진명을 남용할까 걱정되지 않나요?"

TextEng: "How could I discover your True Name?"
"Are there any other relics?"
"What is Cania?"
"I should destroy you for betraying me."
"I require your assistance. Quickly."
"So we meet again."
"It is good to see you again, Reaper."
"I would like to know more about how the Relic works."
"How do I return home from here?"
"Why are rogue stones so important?"
"What do you mean by anchoring?"
"What about the far door, the one covered in mist?"
"You have to be dead to go through it?"
"Where does the central portal go?"
"So I am immortal? I cannot die?"
Text: "그러면 전 불사인가요? 죽을 수 없는 건가요?"

TextEng: "I've heard enough about the Relic."
"I must go."
"Tell me about the Relic again."
"I must go to the leader of my adventuring party."
"I have died and wish to return to where I fell."
"But who created the relic? What is it?"
"That's not an answer."
"Tell me about your realm once again."
"Are there many places like this?"
"There is a door at the far end of the room, covered in mist..."
Text: "방 저 끝에 안개로 덮인 문이 있는데..."

TextEng: "Why not?"
"What are all these doors?"
"No, not yet."
"Yes, do that."
"But...where is this place exactly?"
"I don't understand."
"I would like to know more about you."
"Enough of that, then."
"Do you rule here? Or do you serve another?"
"Is that an answer?"
"What is the significance of the relic?"
"So could I command you to come with me?"
Text: "그러면 당신에게 저와 함께 오라고 명령할 수 있나요?"

TextEng: "Is there no way to free you?"
"How did you come to be here?"
"Who created this realm, then?"
"But... what *are* you, exactly?"
"That is a lot of names."
"True Name?"
"Why must it be secret?"
"It seems I died once again."
